name: WhatsAsena
description: WhatsAsena project - Makes it easy and fun to use Whatsapp.

ASENA_SESSION.description: Session code you created with qr.js.

SUDO.description: Sudo mode; Your number must be in international format. So you should have your number after the country code. Example: 1205xxxxxxxxx (USA number +1)

LANGUAGE.description: The language of the bot. English => EN, Azerbaijani => AZ, Turkish => TR, Malayalam => ML, Hindi => HI, Indonesia => IN,  EspaÃ±ol => ES

SEND_READ.description: If you want to omit seen, set this to true.

HEROKU.description: If it is running in Heroku, set this to true.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Heroku API Key get it from https://dashboard.heroku.com/account

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Heroku App Name you setup

DEBUG.description: For additional info useful for developers

REMOVE_BG_API_KEY.description: Needed For removing the background of photos. Get it from https://remove.bg

NO_ONLINE.description: If you don't want to appear online, set this to true.

COFFEEHOUSE_API_KEY.description: CoffeeHouse API Key. Need for Lydia. https://coffeehouse.intellivoid.net/
